snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama is holding a meeting with top administration officials handling the federal government response to the Ebola outbreak, the White House said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Obama Meets With Administration Officials on Ebola Response
headline.main: Obama Meets With Administration Officials on Ebola Response

lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama is holding a meeting with top administration officials handling the federal government response to the Ebola outbreak, the White House said on Thursday.
